text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
At last, the curtains on the Arima Kinen<n>rise. This
will be the finale of Fuji<n>Kiseki's four-part
challenge.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
The crowd sends her off in a sea of<n>unending
cheers. She tells me how<n>thankful she is that I've
been there for<n>her all this time.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She goes off to run in the race. She's<n>more
dazzling than she's ever been and<n>is the most
brilliant star in the world.
